MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the SY13 postcode area of Bettisfield. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 7:55am. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:18am on 26th January 2021
